skills.name: Crow Summoning
skills.description: Summons crows to attack the enemy and inflict Continuous Damage for 1 turn with a 50% chance.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%

skill_effect.name: Continuous DMG
skill_effect.description: Deals 5% of monster's max HP as damage every turn

skills.name: Jealousy
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with the power of jealousy and weakens the Defense for 2 turns with a 50% chance. The effect is activated with a 100% chance if the enemy has beneficial effects.

skill_effect.name: AOE
skill_effect.description: Applies skill to more than one target

skills.name: Curse
skills.description: Curses an enemy, removing the beneficial effects on the enemy. Also, with an 80% chance, disturbs the enemy's HP recovery and prevents the enemy from receiving any beneficial effects for 2 turns.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Cooltime Turn -1

skill_effect.name: Beneficial Effects Blocked
skill_effect.description: Buffs cannot be applied to the monster

skill_effect.name: Disturb HP Recovery
skill_effect.description: Healing effects are blocked for a number of turns

skill_effect.name: Remove Buff
skill_effect.description: Removes one or more beneficial effects from target monster(s)
